statements: SELECT id, sequence_name, sequence_data, created_at FROM dna_sequences_metadata;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences_metadata ORDER BY sequence_name DESC;
SELECT id, sequence_name FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE sequence_name LIKE '%AT%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sequence_name, created_at FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE sequence_name = 'Sequence1';
SELECT id, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences_metadata WHERE sequence_data LIKE '%ATG%';
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM metadata WHERE sequence_id = 2;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY sequence_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM metadata WHERE metadata_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 100;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'author' ORDER BY metadata_id DESC;
SELECT sequence_name, sequence_data FROM dna_sequences WHERE sequence_name LIKE '%COVID%' ORDER BY sequence_id ASC;

SELECT sequence_id, sequence_name, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM dna_sequences JOIN metadata ON dna_sequences.sequence_id = metadata.sequence_id WHERE metadata_key = 'researcher' ORDER BY sequence_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence, name FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, description FROM dna_sequences WHERE name = 'example_name';
SELECT * FROM sequence_metadata JOIN dna_sequences ON sequence_metadata.sequence_id = dna_sequences.id;
SELECT id, tag FROM sequence_tags WHERE tag LIKE 'tag%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, name, description FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM sequence_metadata WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT sequence_tags.tag, dna_sequences.sequence FROM sequence_tags JOIN dna_sequences ON sequence_tags.sequence_id = dna_sequences.id WHERE sequence_tags.tag LIKE 'gene%';
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_sequences, organism FROM sequence_metadata GROUP BY organism HAVING COUNT(id) > 5 ORDER BY total_sequences DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT gene_name, dna_id FROM genes WHERE gene_id = 5;
SELECT protein_name, annotation_text FROM proteins JOIN annotations ON proteins.protein_id = annotations.protein_id;
SELECT sequence, length FROM dna_sequences WHERE organism = 'human';
SELECT gene_name, protein_name, annotation_text FROM genes JOIN proteins ON genes.dna_id = proteins.dna_id JOIN annotations ON proteins.protein_id = annotations.protein_id;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM genes WHERE gene_id > 100 ORDER BY gene_name DESC;
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, sequence FROM proteins JOIN dna_sequences ON proteins.dna_id = dna_sequences.dna_id WHERE length > 200;
SELECT * FROM annotations WHERE annotation_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT dna_id, organism, length FROM dna_sequences WHERE organism = 'Human' ORDER BY length DESC;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence, description FROM dna_sequences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sequence_id, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM sequence_metadata ORDER BY metadata_key DESC;
SELECT * FROM sequence_tags WHERE tag LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY tag ASC;
SELECT sequence_id, annotation FROM sequence_annotations WHERE LENGTH(annotation) > 20;
SELECT * FROM dna_sequences;
SELECT id, sequence FROM dna_sequences ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT s.id, s.description, m.metadata_key, m.metadata_value FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_metadata m ON s.id = m.sequence_id WHERE s.id = 2;
SELECT s.id, s.sequence, t.tag FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_tags t ON s.id = t.sequence_id WHERE s.sequence LIKE '%ACGT%' ORDER BY s.id ASC;

SELECT s.id, s.sequence, a.annotation FROM dna_sequences s JOIN sequence_annotations a ON s.id = a.sequence_id WHERE a.annotation LIKE '%important%' AND s.sequence LIKE '%AACGTT%' ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT 5;
